title: Bowl with Flared Rim and “Partridge-feather” Mottles
objectDate: Northern Song (960–1127) or Jin dynasty (1115–1234), late 11th/12th century
medium: Northern black ware, Cizhou type; stoneware with overglaze and russet markings (interior) and russet “skin”(exterior)
creditLine: Art Institute of Chicago. Gift of Dorothy Braude Edinburg to the Harry B. and Bessie K. Braude Memorial Collection
